price: Ni jedhu: “Nuti kana dura maatii keenya keessatti (Rabbi irraa) sodaatoo turre.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبۡلُ فِيٓ أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِقِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālū innā kunnā qablu fī ahlinā mush'fiqīna
